summary: Faster Bow Draw and Arrow Speed
descriptionHtml:
Ever Trying to Hit a flying dragon but your arrows are not fast enough?
Ever Trying to get one last shot into an enemy before they get too close?

If you ever have these problems then this mod is the solution for you!
This mod decreases the bow draw Time to about 0.20 seconds!
This mod also almost TRIPLES arrow speed for those pesky moving targets!
author: TerrifyingToddler
